title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.4 - Haircuts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.4 - Haircuts

State Regulations
(a) Hair shall be
cut only by persons who, in the opinion of the chief administrative officer, are trained or skilled in the use of barber tools. (b) Barber tools shall be maintained in a
safe and sanitary condition. (c) Haircuts shall be provided indigent prisoners at facility expense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7005.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
